attributes.additional_details:
Our lollipop ladies are very valued and respected in the Brimington area.
A lot of school children who attend brimington junior school walk to school on there own so the lollipop lady is very needed.
We don't want to lose our lollipop ladies!
What's it going to take a child getting seriously hurt or worse for the people responsible to realise that these ladies are needed!
Sign the petition to show your support!!
